description: The first batch of the Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine has been given to health and social care staff.
title: Covid-19 vaccine: Guernsey prioritises health and care workers
title_page: Covid-19 vaccine: Guernsey prioritises health and care workers - BBC News
maintext: Dr Brink said the atmosphere among the medical staff responsible for administering the vaccine was one of "great satisfaction" and thanked those whose work had "made this possible in such a short period of time".
